data.title: Phone Version - How To Stop Time On A Daily Timesheet
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know about starting employee's time on a Daily Timesheet.
data.body:
Stopping time on a Daily Timesheet is easy to accomplish. This article will walk you through everything you need to know about stopping a Daily Timesheet! 

# Requirements
 NOTE: The access that you need is typically the access that is provided to Supervisors / Foreman. 

# Information
 FieldFlo recommends that you have your employees verify their time via the SMS text message option. If you want to learn how to send employees text messages so they can verify their time using SMS verification, click the button below to be taken to the " How To Send An Employee A SMS Text Verification For The Daily Timesheet " article: 
 How To Send An Employee A SMS Text Verification For The Daily Timesheet If you want to learn how to have an employee verify from the Supervisor's device, click the button below to be taken to the " How Can Employees Verify Their Time From A Supervisor's Device " article: 
 How Do I Verify Time On A Supervisors Device 

# Here are the steps to stopping time on a Daily Timesheet:

- Click on theThree Linesin the top left corner of your screen which will expand the Main Menu. Then click theProjectsmodule. 
- Now that you are on theProjectsmodule page, click the+ Filterbutton. 
- You can search for theProjectmultiple ways from the Filter. Enter the relevant information into which ever filter you want to use or combination of filters and hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- Click on theProject. 
- Click on theDaily Timesheet. 
- Click theSelect Allradio button to stop time for allEmployeesor you can click theRadio Buttonnext to eachEmployeeto stop their time individually. 
- Click theStopbutton. 
- The "STOP CLOCK FOR ALL" popup will appear (if you clicked theSelect Allradio button). Click the "Did they take a break?" dropdown and select the amount of break time.NOTE: This is for non-paid break time. 
- Click the "I verify the information above is correct" radio button. 
- Enter yourPINand clickSubmit. 
- Once all of theEmployees'time has been stopped, all Employees will be orange and theVerifybutton will appear.

data.title: Phone Version - How To Send An Employee A SMS Text Verification For The Daily Timesheet
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know about sending an employee a text message for SMS verification on a Daily Timesheet.
data.body:
It's very easy to send a text message for employee's to verify their time on a Daily Timesheet using the SMS verification. This article will walk you through everything you need to know so that you can send these text messages which will allow your employees to verify their time on a Daily Timesheet. 

# Requirements
 NOTE: The employee must allow text messages to be sent to their personal device. 

 NOTE: The employee must have their phone number listed on their employee profile in FieldFlo. Your company's Admin or Guru will have access to check the employee profiles. The Admin or Guru can also add these phone numbers if they are missing. 

# Information
 FieldFlo does recommend that you have employees verify their time on a Daily Timesheet using the SMS verification method. This is the best way to make sure that the employees themselves are verifying their time. 

# Here are the steps to send an employee a SMS text verification for the Daily Timesheet
 Click the video below to watch "How To Send An Employee A SMS Text Verification For the Daily Timesheet". 

- Click on theThree Linesin the top left corner of your screen which will expand the Main Menu. Then click theProjectsmodule. 
- Now that you are on theProjectsmodule page, click the+ Filterbutton. 
- You can search for theProjectmultiple ways by using Filters. Enter the relevant information into the each of the Filter fields you want to use hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- Click on theProject. 
- Click on theDaily Timesheet. 
- Before we can sendSMSverification we need to stop time on the timesheet, to do this select theRadiobutton on the top left of employees to select all employees or select the employee'sindividualRadioButtonto stop time individually. 
- At the bottom, ClickStop. 
- Fill out theStop Clock For Allverification and clickSubmit. 
- Once you stop the time, all employees should turn yellow. 
- Click theSelect Allradio button to send aSMSverification for allEmployeesor you can click theRadio Buttonnext to eachEmployeeto send aSMSverification individually. 
- Once you have yourEmployeesselected, click theSMSphone icon to send yourSMSverification. 
- TheSend Text Messagepop up will appear, clickYESto send SMS. 
- Once the SMS is sent, the employees should have this redSMS SENTbox next to their name.Note:If the SMS was unable to send, you will be notified and the employee will not have this SMS SENT box next to their name. 
- When employees verified their time, the employee name should be black with a greenVerifiedbox next to their name.

data.title: Phone Version - How To Start Time On A Daily Timesheet for the First Time
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know about starting time on a Daily Timesheet for the first time from a Phone.
data.body:
It is super easy to start a Daily Timesheet, and this article will walk you through everything you need to know to start a Daily Timesheet in FieldFlo for the first time on a Project! 

# Requirements
 NOTE: The access that you need is typically the access that is provided to Supervisors / Foreman. 

 NOTE: You must have access to Projects and adding Project Forms. 

# Information
 FieldFlo recommends that you have your employees verify their time via the SMS text message option. If you want to learn how to send employees text messages so they can verify their time using SMS verification, click the button below to be taken to the " How To Send An Employee A SMS Text Verification For The Daily Timesheet " article: 
 How To Send An Employee A SMS Text Verification For The Daily Timesheet If you want to learn how to start time and copy a Daily Timesheet from a previous day click on this button below to be taken to the " How Do I Use “Same As Previous Day” For A Daily Timesheet? " article: 
 How Do I Use “Same As Previous Day” For A Daily Timesheet? If you want to learn how to stop time on a Daily Timesheet, click on this button below to be taken to the " How To Stop Time on a Daily Time Sheet " article: 
 How To Stop Time On A Daily Timesheet 

# Here are the steps to start a Daily Timesheet on a Project for the first time

- Click on theThree Linesin the top left corner of your screen which will expand the Main Menu. Then click theProjectsmodule. 
- Now that you are on theProjectsmodule page, click the+ Filterbutton. 
- You can search for theProjectmultiple ways from theFilter. Enter the relevant information into which ever filter you want to use or combination of filters and hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- Click on theProject. 
- ClickStart Day. This will bring in all of mandatory forms for the day that your company has picked for you to complete, including theDaily Time Sheet. 
- A popup will appear that asks "Are you sure you want to start you day in project:..." ClickYes. 
- Click on theDaily Timesheet. 
- Now that theDaily Timesheetis open, click inside theForeman / Superintendent Signaturedropdown. 
- From the dropdown, select yourSupervisororForemanorSuperintendent. 
- (OPTIONAL)If theSupervisororForemanorSuperintendentthat you selected should be added to theDaily Timesheet, click the blue hyperlink "Add to timesheet". 
- On the bottom right of your screen you should see a little person with a+. Click the blueAdd Employee(s)button. 
- TheAdd Employeesscreen will popup and you can either filterEmployeesby clicking in theFilter Employeefield or you can click theRadio Buttonnext to everyEmployeethat you want to add to the timesheet. 
- Now that yourEmployeehave been added to theDaily Timesheet, make sure to select aPosition and Phasefor eachEmployeeby clicking theSelect PositionandSelect Phasedropdown.NOTE: Position is ALWAYS Required. Phases depends on your company setup and may not be available. 
- Now you can click theSelect Allradio button if you want to start the time for allEmployeesat the same time or you can select theEmployeesindividually by clicking theRadio Buttonnext to eachEmployee. 
- Once you have selected all theEmployeesthat you want to start click the greenSTARTbutton. 
- The "Please Confirm?" popup will appear saying, "This action will start timer for selected employees Are you sure?" ClickYes. 
- When theEmployeestime has started theEmployeeswill turn green.

data.title: How Do I Reset A PIN
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know about resetting a PIN for an employee.
data.body:
It is easy to reset an employee's PIN and this article will explain exactly how to do it! 

# Requirements
 NOTE: In order to change Employee PIN(s), you must be an Admin or Guru at your company and have access to the Employee module on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu. 

# Information
 You might be wondering, " What is a PIN? " A PIN is an employees Personal Identification Number. This number is what an employee will use as their Legal Signature when verifying: 

- Daily Timesheets 
- PSI / JHA / SPA 
- Inspection Forms 
- etc. You may be wondering, " Who needs a PIN? " All employees need a PIN. 

 Or maybe you are asking, " How do I know what the PIN should be? " FieldFlo recommends that you use the last 4 digits for an employees Social Security. The reason(s) we recommend this are: 

- It is easier for Admins to set these up because they probably have access to this already 
- It is easier for an employee to remember 
- It is a legally bound number to the employee 
- It is less likely that an employee will be willing to share this confidential number with their fellow employees 

# Here are the steps to resetting a PIN:
 Click this Video to watch the "How Do I Reset A PIN" video: 

- Click on theEmployeesmodule (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu). 
- Now that you are on the Employees module page, click inside theEmployee Quick Searchfield. Type in the name of the employee you are needing to change the password for and hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- On the right hand side of the employee that you are needing to change the password for, are three little dots. Clickthree little dotsand then clickReset PIN. 
- A popup will appear that will allow you to set a PIN number. Enter thePINand clickSave. 
- Another popup will appear saying "PIN Number updated successfully".

data.title: How Do I Use GEO Fencing or GEO Tagging
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know about using GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging.
data.body:
Geo Fencing and Geo Tagging are incredible features that will allow your company to have more control over your projects. This article will explain exactly what each feature is and how you can use each of them in you business! 

# Requirements
 NOTE: GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging are defaulted to OFF throughout your portal. If you would like to use either or both of these, you need to turn them on in the Project Details under settings. 

 NOTE: FieldFlo does not have a way to force an employee to share their location. This is dependent on your company's policy and whether or not you require them to share their location. 

# Information
 If you are not sure what GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging are, no worries, we are here to help explain! 

 GEO Fencing is and invisible fence that is placed around your project in a half mile radius, and is based on your Project's address or your Projects Longitude and Latitude. If this is turned on "Yes", the Supervisor will not be able start a Daily Timesheet until the Supervisor is within the half mile radius. 

 GEO Tagging is a location recorder of the employees. In other words, when GEO Tagging is turned on, FieldFlo will send a text message to employees asking them to "Check-in" or "Check-out" when a Supervisor Starts or Ends time on the Daily Timesheet. 

# Here are the steps to turn on GEO Fencing or GEO Tagging:
 Click this Video to watch the "How To Turn On GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging" video. 

- Click on theProjectsmodule (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu). 
- Now that you are on the Projects module page, click insideProject Quick Searchfield. 
- You can change how you search for a Project by clicking on the drop-down in the Project Quick Search field to either search by "Name" or "Number".Two options:ClickNameand type in the first couple of characters to search by Project Name and hitEnteron your keyboard.ClickNumberand type in the first couple of numbers to search by Project Number and hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- Click on theProject. 
- On the right hand side you will see blue text that says "Project Details". Click theProject Detailshyperlink. 
- Click onSettings. 
- Find the GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging drop-downs and change them to "Yes" to turn on features. 
- Now that these say "Yes" scroll down and clickSave. 

# Here are the steps to see where an employee checked in using the GEO Tagging location:
 NOTE: GEO Tagging must be turned on and a timesheet must exist that an employee has checked in on. 

 NOTE: You can also check on past check-ins an and check-outs under the Closed Forms section of a Project if Geo Tagging was turned on. 

 Click this Video to watch the "How To See Where An Employee Checked In" video. 

- Click on theProjectsmodule (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu). 
- Now that you are on the Projects module page, click insideProject Quick Searchfield. 
- You can change how you search for a Project by clicking on the drop-down in the Project Quick Search field to either search by "Name" or "Number".Two options:ClickNameand type in the first couple of characters to search by Project Name and hitEnteron your keyboard.ClickNumberand type in the first couple of numbers to search by Project Number and hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- Click on theProject. 
- Scroll down and click on theDaily Time Sheet. 
- Find the Employee and click on theEmployeeto show the details. 
- Next to Geo Tagging, clickINorOUTto see where an employe checked in or checked out and a pop-up will appear showing the location.

data.title: How Do I Reset A Password
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know so you can reset someone's password quickly and easily!
data.body:
It's easy to reset someone's password and this article will explain exactly how you can do it! 

# Requirements
 NOTE: In order to change Employee passwords, you must be an Admin or Guru at your company, and have access to the Employee module on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu. 

# Information
 You might be wondering, "What is an employee password used for?" An employee password is used only by the employees that need to be able to log into your company's FieldFlo Portal. 

# Here are the steps to resetting a password:
 Click this Video to watch the "How Do I Reset A Password" video: 

- Click on theEmployeesmodule (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu). 
- Now that you are on the Employees module page, click inside theEmployee Quick Searchfield. Type in the name of the employee you are needing to change the password for and hitEnteron your keyboard. 
- On the right hand side of the employee that you are needing to change the password for, are three little dots. Clickthree little dotsand then clickReset Password. 
- A popup will appear asking you to "Please Confirm?"ClickYesto confirm. 
- After you click yes another popup will appear with a notification that the says "Password Reset Successfully". ClickOK
